name: Nemibi
description:
Nemibi is an adorable 2D platformer featuring a story, various levels, zones, characters, minigames and a level editor!

A very loud and strange noise has just occurred on the Nebi Island!

Will you be able to discover where it comes from and solve everything?

- Over 30 big levels in 6 different themed zones and bosses!

- 2 playable characters with different abilities!

- Create and play your own levels with the level editor!

- Various story scenes and characters!

- Play various minigames!

- Unlockable illustrations!

- Save the game in multiple save slots!

- Multiple language support! (English, Español, Português, 日本語)

- And much more! Play the game to find out more!

Mibi!

"Always motivated by almost everything and worried about anything that happens wherever he is!"

Nemi!

"She likes to help others with any problem that happens, although she is a bit curious and sometimes scared!"

Note! The game doesn't require an internet connection so it can be played offline!

iOS®/iPhone®/macOS® Note! There are no plans to release Nemibi for iOS®, iPhone® or macOS® platforms.

Windows® Minimum System Requirements!

OS: Windows® XP SP2 (32-bits)

CPU: Any CPU With 1.0 GHz

RAM: At least 192 MB

GPU: Any integrated/dedicated GPU with 32 MB VRAM

DirectX®: DirectX® 9 or Higher with Direct3D support

Storage Space: 40 MB

Android™ Requirements!

The game can work in any Android™ device, but it must have at least minimum Android™ 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich and 40 MB of storage for installing and updating.
